metadata.Name: ANETAC
metadata.Description: ANETAC is an English-Arabic named entity transliteration and classification dataset built from freely available parallel translation corpora. It contains 79,924 instances, each a triplet of an English named entity, its Arabic transliteration, and its class (Person, Location, or Organization).
metadata.Paper Title: ANETAC: Arabic Named Entity Transliteration and Classification Dataset
Affiliations: Department of Computer Science USTHB University Bab-Ezzouar, Algiers, Algeria
Informatics Research Centre University of Salford M5 4WT, United Kingdom
Department of Computer Science USTHB University Bab-Ezzouar, Algiers, Algeria
metadata.Abstract: In this paper, we make freely accessible ANETAC 1 our English-Arabic named entity transliteration and classification dataset that we built from freely available parallel translation corpora. The dataset contains 79 924 , instances, each instance is a triplet ( e, a, c ) , where e is the English named entity, a is its Arabic transliteration and c is its class that can be either a Person, a Location, or an Organization. The ANETAC dataset is mainly aimed for the researchers that are working on Arabic named entity transliteration, but it can also be used for named entity classification purposes.
